attributes.action: build  three million homes and end the recession.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: End the recession by building much needed housing for britain at least 3 million more quality homes. The increased quantity of houses will reduce prices making housing in the UK more affordable. Whilst the spur to economic activity will end the recession. 90% of british land is virgin and unused. Lets revise this and amend the greenbelt law which is archaic and too restrictive.
